about_the_game:
Mangoji — is not just a card game; it's an exhilarating dive into a world of 18+ excitement and beauty, where strategy and luck confront each other head-on. Prepare for a unique adventure, as over 150 enchanting ladies await to become part of your gaming experience.


Each card is a work of art, an embodiment of style and elegance, making each of your moves not just a strategic decision but also a visual pleasure. Discover a collection of uniquely designed cards, each lady with her own character and charm, bringing diversity and depth to the gameplay.

The gameplay in Mangoji is designed to captivate and evoke emotions. Choose your tactics based on your hand, take risks and bluff, using not only the classic rules of card games but also new elements specially added for this game to make every match unpredictable and exciting.

Features of the game:

  • Over 150 unique cards featuring images of ladies, each with their own story and style.
  • A deep and multifaceted gameplay where every decision you make matters.
  • High-resolution visual effects created to amaze your imagination.
  • Dynamic encounters that require both strategic thinking and the willingness to take risks.
  • An engaging atmosphere that retains the classic spirit of card games while adding new levels of interaction and intrigue.


Mangoji is not just a game it's a journey filled with vivid impressions, strategic battles, and visual splendor. Are you ready to take on the challenge and conquer the world of Mangoji? Join the game where each card promises a new adventure! Attention strip game 18+.

content_descriptors.notes: Attention, the game contains naked girls in anime style! The game does not contain scenes of sex, violence or BDSM.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel i3/i5/i7/i9 Or AMD analog
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible AMD Or Nvidia

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS Catalina or later 64-bit
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

name: Mangoji

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8-10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel i3/i5/i7/i9 Or AMD analog
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i3/i5/i7/i9 Or AMD analog
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
